sentences.sContent: He send us a postdate cheque.
sentences.sCn: 他寄给我们一张填迟日期的支票。

sentences.sContent: She let me postdate the cheque until the end of the month.
sentences.sContent_eng: She let me postdate the cheque until the end of the month.
sentences.sCn: 她让我将支票上的日期填为月底。

remMethod.val: post (在后面) + date (日期) → 推迟…的日期

trans.tranOther: if you postdate a cheque, you write it with a date that is later than the actual date, so that it will not become effective until that time
